userErrors.access.userAlreadyInvited: That user has already been invited, they must log-in to get access
userErrors.access.userAlreadyAdded: That user has already been given access
userErrors.assignment.alreadyFinalized: The assignment has already been finalised

devEnvironmentWarnings.dummy: This is a demo instance of CDM, information you enter here will only be stored in your browser, and will not be sent to our server
devEnvironmentWarnings.dev: This is a test instance of CDM, information you enter here will be periodically deleted.

appTitle.secondary: Humanitarian Coordination Structures at the Country Level

components.surveyIntro: Welcome to the annual mapping survey on  humanitarian coordination structures and capacities in place during 2020. Click on the login button. You will be asked to log in using your Humanitarian ID email and password. If you have forgotten your credentials or need to register, please follow the prompts on the following Humanitarian ID page.

acceptableUseNotification.title: Acceptable Use Notification
acceptableUseNotification.p1: Unauthorized access to this United Nations Computer System is prohibited by ST/SGB/2004/15 ("Use of information and communication technology resources and data" of 29 November 2004)
acceptableUseNotification.p2: Authorized users shall ensure that their use of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) resources and ICT data is consistent with their obligations as staff members or such other obligations as may apply to them
acceptableUseNotification.p3: All use of ICT resources and ICT data is subject to monitoring and investigation as set forth in ST/SGB/2004/15
acceptableUseNotification.p4: Use of this system by any user, authorized or unauthorized, constitutes consent to the applicable UN regulations and rules

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.info: We were unable to find the page you were looking for

unsupportedBrowser.title: Unsupported Browser!
unsupportedBrowser.info: Unfortunately, your current browser is not supported. Please switch to either Firefox or Google Chrome. To do this, simply copy the form address (URL) above, then open Firefox or Chrome, and paste the address into the browser.

accessControl.addPersonInfo: Enter the email address of the person you'd like to give access to. If they haven't logged-in before, they will be given an invite that will become active after they log-in.
accessControl.confirmRoleUpdate: Are you sure you want to change {name}'s role to {role}?
accessControl.confirmRoleRemoval: Are you sure you want to remove access for {name}?
accessControl.noUsers: No assigned users. No one has been granted access

notFound.title: Operation not found
notFound.info: We were unable to find the operation you were looking for

forms.unsavedChangesPrompt: Are you sure you want to navigate away? You have unsaved changes.

submit.message: When you have completed the form, please click on the "Submit" button below to send it to the moderator. {warning,component} Please ensure that the form is complete and correct before proceeding with the submission.
submit.warning: Please note that you will not be able to edit your answers after it has been submitted.
submit.confirm: I confirm that the form is complete and ready to be submitted

tooltip.title: new feature:
tooltip.description: click this button to see all users collaborating on this survey

loading.title: Loading Form
loading.info: It may take a moment for the form to load, but please be patient, and don't close your browser; and if the browser alerts you that the page has become unresponsive, please press wait.

prompts.finished: Thank you for completing the survey, you will be contacted if complementary information is needed.
prompts.submissionRequired: Please remember to come back and submit your final response to the survey.

invalidData.title: Incomplete/Invalid information entered
invalidData.infoOnNavigation: There are some issues with the information you have entered on this page. You can fix these now, or continue with the rest of the form, and come back later. These issues must be fixed in order to finalize and submit the survey.
invalidData.infoOnSubmit: There are some issues with the information you have entered. You must go back and fix them before you can submit the form.

status.conflict: Form has been modified by another person, please refresh.

errors.conflict: This form was modified by {person} {timeAgo} (after you loaded the page), so we can't save your changes. Please refresh your page and try again.

repeatremove.heading: Remove Item
repeatremove.msg: This will permanently remove the item and all the data in it. Are you sure?

filepicker.notFound: File previously submitted. If you wish to replace it, click the arrows to remove the file and then upload a different file.
filepicker.resetWarning: This will remove the file. Are you sure?

removingItem.title: Removing item
removingItem.message: Please wait while the item is removed. This may take a moment. If the browser alerts you that the page has become unresponsive, please press 'Wait'.

none.title: No forms
none.info: No forms have been assigned to this cluster for the current reporting window
